title: Does My Child Feel Safe Expressing Emotions?
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: A dad is perplexed about how to best support his …
itunes:summary:
A dad is perplexed about how to best support his son when he gets hurt. “I have always tried to give him the space and freedom to express his emotions,” he writes, but lately his son has been rejecting support and insisting through tears that he is not hurt. This dad isn’t sure how to handle it. “I want him to know he can express his emotions in a safe way.”
